titleInfo.title: Freddie Carpenter at Twilight Hour Elks Club

mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy on blue) announcing Freddie Carpenter and the Rookies with Libby Cater, Bernard Hardison on 88, Good Rockin' Beasley, Kid King Combo, and others at the Twilight Hour Elks Club on Saturdays and Sundays from May 31 to June 1 and June 7 and 8. Poster features a metal photoplate of Freddie Carpenter and the Rookies.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
